trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> objects for each state of the right-pointing track bar slider (also known as the thumb).
trans-unit.target: Fornisce oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> per ciascuno stato del dispositivo di scorrimento (anche noto come casella di scorrimento) di un indicatore di avanzamento verso destra.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the right-pointing track bar slider.
trans-unit.target: Ogni proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight> classe restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> per uno stato diverso di verso destra, tenere traccia della barra di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight.Normal%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarThumbRight1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Handle del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate di `DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarThumbRight1` metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents a right-pointing track bar slider in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elemento dello stile di visualizzazione che rappresenta il dispositivo di scorrimento di un indicatore di avanzamento verso destra nello stato disabilitato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents a right-pointing track bar slider in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> che rappresenta il dispositivo di scorrimento di un indicatore di avanzamento verso destra nello stato disabilitato.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight.Disabled%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarThumbRight5` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
